class.desc: An emum for the gravity of compiler errors/warnings.

constant.name: PROBLEM_RUNTIME_ERROR
constant.desc: Means the compiler has a major exception. The current compilation is a failure.

constant.name: PROBLEM_LANG_ERROR
constant.desc: Means the compiler has a language error found in a source file. The current compilation will be a failure, but more errors can be collected.

constant.name: PROBLEM_LANG_WARNING
constant.desc: Means the compiler has a language warning from a position in a source file. The current compilation continues.
